item.title: About
item.description: Quick 60 second intro - I build software products for a living.

item.title: Reliving the Desi life: Year-long musings
item.description: I started writing this article on the 22nd of November, 2015 (and am late in posting this, as usual).

item.title: The Indian Literary Hypocrisy
item.description: I think of highly “intellectual” people who LOVE Amish Tripathi (AT) for the “Shiva” trilogy and HATE Chetan Bhagat (CB) for all his writing as hypocrites.

item.title: Successful Life
item.description: It’s a funny life. In a twisted way. One wants to be happy.

item.description: This one’s inspired from the TFI seminar arranged by Technovanza some time back.

item.title: Lessons Learnt - Part 2
item.description: I’ll begin this part with what I missed in the previous part- a confession and a thanks-giving.
